    • Method Detail

      • setAmount

        public final void setAmount(double amount,
                            double taxRate,
                            boolean round)
        Description copied from class: MoneyHolder
        Sets the amount.
        Overrides:
        setAmount in class MoneyHolder
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount.
        taxRate - The tax rate for the new amount. Will be applied only if the new amount is superior than the specified amount and if the account does not have the bypass permission.
        round - If you want to round the specified amount (will not round the amount if changed by an event).
